00002 #ifndef  __CVM_COUNTER_H__
00003 #define  __CVM_COUNTER_H__
00004 
00005 #define  ENABLE_PROFILING
00006 
00007 /* \cond */
00008 typedef struct {
00009     char        name[32];
00010     uint64_t    max;
00011     uint64_t    min;
00012     uint64_t    total;
00013     uint64_t    updates;
00014 } cvm_counter_t;
00015 
00016 /* \endcond */
00017 
00018 
00019 #ifdef  ENABLE_PROFILING
00020 static inline void
00021 cvm_counter_update(cvm_counter_t  *s, uint64_t  val64)
00022 {
00023     if(val64 > s->max)
00024         s->max = val64;
00025     if(val64 < s->min)
00026         s->min = val64;
00027     s->total += val64;
00028     s->updates ++;
00029     CVMX_SYNCW;
00030 }
00031 #else
00032 #define cvm_counter_update(s, val64)  do { }while(0)
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 
00036 static inline void
00037 cvm_counter_init(cvm_counter_t   *s, char *name)
00038 {
00039     if(strlen(name))
00040         strcpy(s->name, name);
00041     else
00042         s->name[0] = 0;
00043     s->max = s->total = s->updates = 0;
00044     s->min = (uint64_t)-1;
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 
00049 #ifdef  ENABLE_PROFILING
00050 static inline void
00051 cvm_counter_print(cvm_counter_t  *s)
00052 {
00053     printf("%s\n  Updates: %llu Total: %llu Max: %llu  Min: %llu Avg: %llu\n",
00054          s->name, CAST64(s->updates), CAST64(s->total), CAST64(s->max),
00055          (s->updates)?CAST64(s->min):0, (s->updates)?CAST64(s->total/s->updates):0);
00056 }
00057 #else
00058 #define cvm_counter_print(s)  do { }while(0)
00059 #endif

00062 
00063 #endif
